concept.title: Using Relative Paths in Metadata Values

conbody.p: Relative paths in metadata values may be specified with the $SERNA_DATA_DIR variable that points to the directory where Serna is installed.

For example:
Relative path to an XML Schema: $SERNA_DATA_DIR/plugins/my-plugin/my-plugin.xsd.
Relative path to an XSL stylesheet: $SERNA_DATA_DIR/plugins/my-plugin/my-plugin.xsl.
